level.text: Except for the Mayor, the Council and the Public Access Corporation, all entities to which a channel is allocated shall enter into a PEG Operating Agreement (PEGOA) with the District
The PEGOA shall include, but not be limited to, the following provisions:
Responsibility for programming and management of the allocated channel;
Prohibition of censorship or control over programming, except as necessary to comply with prohibition of illegal material;
Use of allocated channel time, cablecasting facilities, and technical support as are provided for in the franchise agreement between the District and a cable or open video system operator;
Grounds for the rescission of channel allocation; and
Regular review of operational, technical, and financial abilities to operate the allocated channel;
Probationary period of two (2) years; and
Administrative fees which may be payable to the District.
